name: Techpowerup Dark
description:
Dark themed Techpowerup.com, forum is excluded.
Further improvement such as changing font type, font color and background color will be added in the future.
css:
@-moz-document regexp("https:\\/\\/(www.techpowerup.com)\\/(?!forums).*") {
.frontpagepoll,
.clearfix,
.cardimage,
li,
#quicksearch,
#input,
.vgabios .content .search>div,
.downloads .content .latest>div,
.downloads .content>.dl-left>nav>.tree-wrap,
.staff-member:nth-child(2n+1),
.reviewlist-search>div,
.cpudb .content .search>div,
.cpudb-details .content>.specs-large>div,
.cpudb-details .content .unreleased,
.downloads .content .sort-options,
.gallery-index .addcase-button
{
    background:none!important
}
body,
td,
th,
select,
.pager a,
.flickity-slider,
.frontpagepoll h2,
#page,
#menu,
.sidebar,
footer,
.downloads .content>.dl-left>nav ul.dltree li>a.selected,
.comments .posttext blockquote
{
    background:#212121!important;
}
b,
p,
div,
td,
th,
select,
.pager a,
.clearfix,
#page,
#menu,
#quicksearch,
.sidebar,
footer,
.sidebar-newposts__time,
.reviewlist-search>div,
.reviewlist-search #filtertable>.award>ul>li>label,
label
{
    color:rgb(255, 255, 255)!important;
}
a,a:visited,a:hover,span,#menu,
h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,h7
{
    color:#cf9331!important
}
}

style_setting_options.label: Oxygen, WOFF
Lato, WOFF
Titillium Web, WOFF
Raleway, WOFF
Open Sans, WOFF
